message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price of $180. It's a one-time offer, so don't miss out!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the product, $180 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $100 for it.  Let me know what you think.
I understand that $180 was a bit steep, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $140. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love the product!
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price. I'm still firm on my budget of $100.  If you're not willing to go that low, I'll have to explore other options.
I'm not willing to go as low as $100, but I'm willing to make a compromise. I'll meet you at $120. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love the product!
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility. However, $120 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $110.  This is my final offer, and I'm ready to move on if it's not acceptable.
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $110. I'll meet you at $130. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with the product!
